name: DAB Italia s.c.p.a.
goal: DAB Italia is a network operator for digital radio broadcasting. It provides service to national commercial radio stations and manages a national DAB multiplex.
interests: Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
